data.title: Typical Strong HGI Experience
data.text: As is normally the case, my experience at this HGI was enjoyable in a variety of ways. From the friendly, attentive front desk and restaurant staff to the modern, comfortable room, almost everything worked well. One exception was a poorly-cooked burger one night I stayed in for dinner - but that can happen anywhere. There is a tasty taco restaurant next door if you're interested. Plenty of hot water and heat for chilly MN nights.

data.title: Nice Traveling Experience at Hilton Garden Inn
data.text: The hotel service was excellent. They let me checked in earlier than scheduled so I can settle down before I went on my business trip. Then I found that I forget to bring my iphone charger with me and the hotel service staff let me used her own charger for a couple of days during the trip, which made my trip much easier than without a charger.

data.title: Great Hospitality
data.text: This Hilton Garden Inn consistently delivers a great stay with great interaction from the folks that keep the place humming.  The enthusiastic breakfast staff is an added bonus.  This is my go to place in the area.

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dave,

Thank you for your recent review on Trip Advisor.  We appreciate your kind comments about our staff.  They do keep our hotel humming and I love watching their passion daily to make sure our guests enjoy their time with us.  I appreciate your loyalty and comments and hope to see you again soon!

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The bed is terrible
data.text: The bed was terrible. Gave me back ache. Everything else is okay. Not sure what the issue is, it just sucks you in. There are these knobs to adjust the hardness, they were  at its hardest setting, still. I didn't have proper sleep for two days straights, had to sleep on the floor on the third day

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for letting us know about your recent stay with us on Trip Advisor.  It sounds like there was an issue with your bed not working properly and I am sorry to hear about that.  We always try and stay on top of our Maintenance of our Garden Sleep System beds but we missed the boat on your stay.  For that, we apologize and will make sure to share this with our team so we can rectify for future stays.  We hope you will give us another shot.  Thank you again and hope to see you next time.

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Beautiful and quiet
data.text: Beautifully decorated lobby area, friendly staff and good food made this HGI a nice place to stay. Conveniently located off the highway and near multiple places to eat. The rooms were nice, there is meeting space and fitness and pool area.

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Kathy,

Thank you for the wonderful review you posted on Trip Advisor.  I will make sure to share your response with our team.  We hope to see you again next time!

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Loved this place!!
data.text: Beautiful property!!  My husband and I stayed here last month for our 10th anniversary. The staff was so friendly.  We booked on priceline, but that didn't seem to matter to them. Some hotels seem to have "priceline rooms".... But not these guys..... They even let me pick which room I wanted!  Very comfortable beds. Large, clean rooms. Great location. Coffee and iced lemon water available 24/7 in the lobby.   Right next to International Pancake House, which we enjoyed.

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Happy 10 Year Anniversary.  I'm so happy to hear you shared your special day with us and everything was just as you wanted it to be.  We are so happy that you "Loved this Place!"  We hope to see you again next time!  

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: This Hilton "gets it"!
data.text: This is a great location for us and service at this Hilton Garden Inn is excellent. The breakfast attendant was cheerful and terrific. The rooms are very clean and the location was perfect for our 3 night visit. This was our second stay and I will stay there again.

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Steve,

Thank you for your recent review on Trip Advisor and for your loyalty to our hotel.  We really appreciate it.  We are happy everything is great for you each time.  Hope to see you next time!

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Business
data.text: Usually stay at large Hilton hotel, but this was my first stay at a Hilton Graden Inn.. This location is great as it is quite and in a neighborhood.. Great Front Desk staff !!! I will be back.. They also have Keurig coffee makers .. That's a plus !!

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Simon,

Thank you for your recent review on Trip Advisor.  We really appreciate your kind words.  Keurig's were a huge plus we brought into the hotel.  Everyone seems to love them!  We hope to see you back next time you are in the area! 

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Clean & comfortable - just like you'd expect
data.text: This Hilton property in NW Minneapolis, MN area was a comfortable 1 night stay for a business trip. The room furnishings were nice quality and had everything I needed to prepare for the business meeting I was scheduled to conduct. Since I was only there briefly I would suspect this site is primarily for business travelers but could also certainly accommodate those on family travel.

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Kevin,

Thank you for staying with us during your recent business trip.  We appreciate your kind comments about our hotel!  "Clean and Comfortable" is exactly what we strive to offer each and every time as well.  Hope to see you again the next time you are in the area.  

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good place to stay
data.text: We stayed here for our visit to the Ryder Cup and were quite comfortable all week. The room was well kept for us and we even ate at the restaurant one night and had a good meal.I would stay here again.

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your recent review of our hotel and for staying with us during the Ryder Cup.  It was such a great event for the Minneapolis area and we were happy to host travelers that visited for this.  Should you ever find yourself back in our area, we hope to see you again!

Sincerely:


Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Highly recommend this hotel!
data.text: We stayed here because the wedding we were attending had recommended/reserved rooms for visiting guests. We were welcomed like family and felt right at home. The rooms are clean as are all the public areas and the staff is terrific! I would definitely stay here again.

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Pat,

Your recent review on Trip Advisor is music to my ears with the title, "Highly recommend this hotel!"  We appreciate the great review you shared and are glad you enjoyed your time with us.  Hope to see you again next time!

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice hotel, beds not comfortable
data.text:
We are in room 300 and they claim they have adjustable beds.... I put both sides on soft and they feel like you are sleeping on a comforter on top of a wooden box. Nooooot comfortable at all!!!!
Other than the beds, everything was nice. But beds at a hotel are relatively important.

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Kahla,

Thank you for your recent review on our hotel and letting us know about the bed.  We will definitely take a look at your room as it sounds like there may have been an issue with it.  Thank you for letting us know and we hope you will give us another chance!  We appreciate your review and hope to see you again!

Sincerely:


Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Lunch
data.text:
Applebee's, 
 A lot of families with well behaved young kids , nice to see that , but on my time out I wanted to sit not close to families with small children . Which we did and that was nice as well . 
   Played a game while we waited for food . 
 Fun trivia . 
   Food was good , I ate on the lighter side low cal. Steak over a thick Garvey and spinach/ tomatoes and mushrooms. Very very tasty . 
  My friend had the club and southwest black bean soup . More like a very spicy chilie . For my friend , not so good . 
 All in all very good , 
 A nice view of Fish lake from some Windows , always nice to have a view .

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your recent review.  From what I could read of it, it appears to be a review of Applebee's, which is close to our hotel.  Hopefully you enjoyed the hotel as well if you stayed with us.

Sincerely: 

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Stay!
data.text: From arrival to departure I was treated with smiles from the front desk employees and additional staff! I love the update on the decor and atmosphere since I was there last. My room was clean and comfortable and all my needs were met for my entire stay!

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Debbie,

I'm glad to hear your recent stay with us was a "Great Stay"!   We appreciate all your kind words and hope to see you again soon!

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pillows
data.text: Pillows was not that great could have better ones but overall everything else was great. Had great customer service. Location was good close to place to eat in walking distance. Overall the stay was was great

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your recent review on trip advisor.  We too, agreed it was time to upgrade our pillows and have spent the last two months doing that.  You should see a difference the next time you visit us.  We appreciate your comments as it helps us get better and hope to see you again next time!

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice quick stay
data.text: Stayed for one night on local business.  I always like when HGI have the adjustable memory foam beds which this location did. I used the fitness center which was a bit limited with 2 treadmills and 1 elliptical.  I saw one person enter and then leave since all equipment was being used. I had the continental breakfast and was charged the full $9-$10 even though I only had a yogurt and granola.  At other HGIs I was only charged a couple dollars since I only had cold items. Overall this location was perfect for my work location and the room was comfortable.

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your recent review of our hotel on trip advisor.  We really appreciate your feedback.  I'm sorry to hear you were charged a full breakfast for only a couple of items.  We do have al a carte pricing available and it sounds like it was just a mix up on our end.  We apologize for this.  We hope to see you again soon!

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderful hidden property
data.text: Great business stay. Had a wonderful swim in their clean beautiful pool and great service from the dining staff. It is hidden in a business area so there is no interstate noise at night. Will definitely stay again!

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your recent review of our property.  We really appreciate the kind comments and are glad to hear your stay went well.  We look forward to your next trip!

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great staff!!!
data.text:
We stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn this past weekend and our Rooms were very clean! Lobby and restaurant clean, bright and appealing.Front desk staff was very attentive and helpful! We will 
Definately stay here again. Enjoy the fresh coffee and teas and lemon water in the front lobby. What I liked the most was the staff both at the front desk and the restaurant. The service from the staff is top notch!!!

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your recent review on Trip Advisor!  We really appreciate your kind comments on our "Great Staff" and facility.  We hope to see you again soon!

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Family reunion
data.text: Great experience at the hotel. If only they can restructure their breakfast setting instead of paying out of pocket for it. It cost too much. They can include it with the room charges that will add it

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for staying with us during your recent family reunion and for your review!  We really appreciate your comments.  We do provide a package that does include breakfast in it the next time you are here so you don't have to worry about the additional charge.  I'm glad to see that didn't ruin your experience.  We hope to see you back again!

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Amazing Stay
data.text: Amazing Stay, Cleanest Hotel I've ever Stayed In! Staff was very friendly, hotel was very comforting. Couldn't ask for a better place to stay! Highly Recommended and cant wait till next year when we stay again! Don't waste your money on another hotel, this place will blow you away.

owner_response.author: Mike S, General Manager at Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Maple Grove, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Matthew,

Thank you so much for your raving review.  We are so happy that we could provide an "Amazing Stay? for you.  Also, thank you for your loyalty and we look forward to the next time you are back!

Sincerely:

Mike Severson
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response
